name: The Children by Vitoco
description:
The Children

(c) 2021 by Victor Parada

Pedro has been commanded

to rescue the child,

but he realized that

there are many of them!!!

Game written for NOMAM's

BASIC 10-liners Contest 2021.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- FastBasic 4.5.2 IDE

- Joystick

Load instructions:

- Boot CHILDREN.ATR disk

  without BASIC ROM.

- Load FBI.COM from DOS.

- Type CTRL-L and type

  D:CHILDREN.LST and press

  RETURN key.

- Type CTRL-R to parse 

  and run the game.

- Play the game.

- Press Fire to play again.

Game instructions:

- Press the button to start.

- Use the joystick to move

  Pedro around the zone.

- Pedro can climb through

  ladders and fall down

  from any height.

- Pedro can push big rocks

  if they are not blocked

  from the other side.

- Pedro can dig through

  sand, but objects over

  it will fall.

- Pedro can reach and save

  the children only by the

  side.

- If Pedro got trapped,

  press the button to

  restart the zone.

- When all the zones were

  cleared, a message will

  appear.
